document_data.name: Grainne Jodhpur
document_data.mainbody:
'''Grainne Jodhpur''' was a commoner and a frequent customer of [[Baldur's Gate]]'s [[Elfsong Tavern]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|''If it were up to me, I'd replace all the Flaming Fists with Steel Watchers. At least the big teapots don't make lewd suggestions when you pass by. They smell better, too.''|Grainne Jodhpur}}
document_data.Description: Grainne was a [[human]] woman with olive skin, long reddish brown hair and dark blue eyes.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Grainne Jodhpur frequented the Elfsong Tavern in the [[Lower City]], where she shared a food- and drink-filled table with a group of friends, including [[Cyndirie Vand]] and [[Buff Tanner]]. Grainne was opinionated over the recent changes in the city. She approved the [[construct]]s that were added to the patrols known as [[steel watcher]]s. She greatly preferred the walking "teapots" to the rude catcalling [[Flaming Fist]] brutes.
